headline: Constellation Brands (STZ): Assessing Valuation After a Sharp Year-to-Date Share Price Decline
summary: Constellation Brands (STZ) has quietly lagged the broader market this year, with the stock down sharply even as earnings and cash generation hold up. That disconnect is exactly what catches value focused investors. See our latest analysis for Constellation Brands. Over the past year, Constellation Brands share price return has fallen sharply from its highs, with the year to date share price return of about negative 39 percent signaling fading momentum as investors reassess growth prospects...
